page.title: 02SECONDARY SCHOOL IN N.S.
page.content: Newton Stewart has three schools and nearby Minnigaff,one.The secondary is the{Douglas Ewart High School,} which is one of only two secondary schools in Wigtown District.It has over nine_hundred pupils,many travelling in daily from a wide area around. Before the 1920's the{Douglas}and the{Ewart}were two separate schools. Samuel Douglas left Â£17000 to build a school which opened in 1834 as the Douglas Free School. Later the Ewart family appointed trustees who found land to build a free school,and a High_School for fee_payers.Both were completed in 1864.In 1923 both schools,having financial difficulties,were united under one name,Douglas Ewart High School and transferred to Wigtown County Council.
